1.name: wordpress/envato-marketplace-api-shortcodes
1.description:
This Wordpress plugin will create a number of different shortcodes to get items from any of the envato marketplaces.

Using this plugin you will have access to 7 different plugins for you to use in your posts to get items from the envato marketplace.

Here are the following shortcodes you can use.

[paulund_envato_popular] [paulund_envato_features] [paulund_envato_new_files] [paulund_envato_new_files_from_user] [paulund_envato_random_new_files] [paulund_envato_item] [paulund_envato_user]

Full guide of how to use the shortcodes: http://www.paulund.co.uk/creating-wordpress-shortcodes-for-envato-marketplace-api
